title: Did you "let them eat cake " while voting against raising the minimum wage?
subtitle: Some compared it to the last queen of France before the French Revolution.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Christine Cinema brought the cake to the Senate when she voted against an increase in the minimum wage in a $1.9 trillion relief package from COVID-19, which prompted comparisons with Mary Antoinette's so-called observation on her poor subjects, "Let them eat the cake."
